attributes.action: Abolish all forms of Tax & NI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of running all the public services far outstrips the money gained from all taxes. Increasing taxes frustrates the general public. Healthcare, education, defence shoukld be made freely available at source, the abolition of prescription charges ect. Abolition of fuel tax & road fund licence. Every body deserves to keep what they earn. All those who work should be entitled to a good pension, not what the Govt thinks people deserve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
